text: tavada kavurun (udangukama balaporottuven) minisunta penvima sandaha tamange mudal (vastun) viyadam karamin allahvada avasana dinayada visvasa nokara sitinnoda, (ovunvada allah priya karanne nÃ¦ta. ovunta seyitanma mituraya). kavurun hata seyitan mitureku vasayen sitinneda, ohu itamat napuru mitureki
